body.name: RGB Corner Floor Lamp, Corner Floor Lamp RGB Color Changing Corner Lamp LED Modern Floor Lights with Bluetooth APP and Remote Control Music Sync, 65" RGB Mood Lighting 24H Timing 398+ DIY Modes
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 36 mins
features: 【RGB Adjustable Technology】RGB Corner Floor Lamp build-in RGB light strip, RGB technology light strip has 16 million lighting colors and more than 300 light modes. At the same time, it also supports DIY lighting settings. Switch lights and modes according to different scenes, corner lights can create all the scenes you want for you.

【Three Easy Control Ways】Floor Lamp support app control (Smart Life), remote control and conrtol box. The APP application can better adjust the light color, brightness, and timing switch. You can also DIY your favorite lighting mode according to your needs. You can link multiple LED corner lights at the same time through the APP, and can control them at the same time.

【Music Pulse 】The color-changing floor lamp has a built-in high-sensitivity microphone and has a music mode, the light will pulse with your favorite music rhythm or your voice, immersive you into a real scene experience. When you want to use the Bluetooth APP, you can scan the QR code on the product controller or the packaging box with your mobile phone to download the application.

【Hot Plug Technology】The floor corner lamp adopts a hot-swappable design and is divided into 4 sections for quick disassembly, which can be disassembled at any time (please pay attention to the numbers on the package and install them in order), The 65-inch tall standing light is made of solid aluminum alloy, with a right-angle engineering base design, can save you more space.

【Professional Technical Support】RGB smart floor lamp, 16 million total colors, 90 high quality LED lights support 2500k-6500k warm/cool white light and 1000 lumens of brightness. And equipped with a 24-hour timer function. At the same time, our products enjoy a 180-day exchange and 90-day return policy. If you have any questions before or after purchase, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with 24-hour customer service and technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AIUCA Bluetooth Corner Light AIUCA Bluetooth Smart RGB Floor Corner Light With 16 million color options and 398+ dynamic lighting modes, you can customize your lighting to create the perfect atmosphere in any space. Whether you're looking to set a calming ambiance for meditation or a vibrant atmosphere for a party, you can customize the lighting mode according to your own preferences.

Create Any Atmosphere with 'duoCo StripX' Floor Lamp AIUCA Smart floor lamp features APP (Bluetooth) and floor lamp parallel function, and offers a truly distinct illumination pattern that's unlike other solutions on the market. RGB+IC Technology: Smart IC chip for segmented LED control. Different colors can be displayed on the strip at the same time. At the same time, the smart APP can adjust 300+ preset modes, and can also DIY the mode and line sequence by itself. This allows for a creative color scheme with your choice of layout by simply using the accompanying smartphone app to make changes. Smart APP: Please download the 'duoCo StripX' APP to explore millions of colors and dynamic scenes.

Set whatever you want, dance to your heart's content The LED smart light strip equipped with the wall corner floor lamp in the living room has a brightness of 1000 lumens. The RGB light strip has 16 million colors and supports free adjustment of 2500K-6500K warm/cool white light. With our 24h timer function, you can effortlessly schedule your room floor lamp to turn on and off at specific times. Say goodbye to fumbling in the dark to turn off the lamp or accidentally leaving it on all night.

RGB+IC Adjustable Technology Corner led lightbuild-in premium LED strip, the light strip is made of 90 lamp beads, with low power consumption, no glare, more delicate lighting, protection and safer, the RGB technology light strip has 16 million lighting colors and more than 300 light modes, you can switch theme lights for different scenes as needed. Multifunction You can combine multiple RGB floor lamps through the APP and control them at the same time, After opening the Bluetooth APP, slide to the right to see the linkage setting screen.The 24-hour timer switch function allows you to freely use RGB corner lights. DIY lighting can make you have a world of colors, you can enjoy and manipulate it please. Sync to Music RGB Corner Floor Lamp has built-in high-sensitivity microphone, when the music mode is turned on through the mobile application, it can be synchronized to any music type, lights pulse with rhythm of your favorite songs, greatly enhancing your Movie, Karaoke Bight or Game World.

Multifunctional RGB Floor Lamp The corner floor lamp adopts a quick-release hot-swappable method. You can increase or decrease the number of lamp posts according to your needs at any time. When only one lamp post is installed, the corner lamp can be used as a desk lamp or a desktop decorative lamp. Suitable for e-sports room, audio-visual room, bedroom and other places. Tips: Since the floor lamp adopts a 1:1 docking design, you need to pay attention to the metal contacts on the lamp post when installing the lamp post. Please align the holes before installing. If there is any bending deformation, please do not insert it forcibly to avoid damage.

AIUCA RGB Lights Packing list: Hot Swappable RGB lamp post*4 (Overall length 65 inches / 165cm), Metal Base*2, Base Connector*1, Remote Control*1, Fixing Kit*1, Product Manual*1. Tips: Due to the influence of regulations, this product does not come with an adapter, so it adopts a USB power supply design, and you can plug it into a computer or a charger to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brilliant Illumination, Exquisite Design
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought an LED Lamp, and it has truly transformed my workspace. This isn't just a lamp; it's a fusion of art and functionality that enhances my daily life.The design of the lamp is both elegant and modern, fitting seamlessly into my home office. It's not just a light source; it's a statement piece that draws compliments from everyone who sees it. The build quality is exceptional - sturdy, yet with a touch of sophistication.The lighting itself is a marvel. The LED technology provides a bright, yet gentle light that covers my entire desk without any harsh glare. I love the adjustable settings - whether I need a bright light for focus-intensive tasks or a softer glow for relaxed reading, this lamp delivers.One of the standout features is its energy efficiency. It emits a strong light while consuming minimal power, which is not only good for the environment but also for my electricity bills. The lamp also remains cool to the touch, even after hours of use, which is a testament to its superior design and safety.The ease of use is the icing on the cake. The touch-sensitive controls are intuitive, allowing me to adjust the brightness or switch it on/off with just a simple tap. This level of convenience is something I didn't know I needed until I had it.In summary, this LED Lamp is a game-changer. It provides perfect lighting, has a stunning design, and is energy-efficient. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable, stylish light source. It's a five-star product all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant flow lamp
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the RGB Corner Floor Lamp, and it has truly transformed my space. The modern design seamlessly integrates into any corner, providing an eye-catching focal point. The RGB color-changing feature adds a dynamic and vibrant atmosphere to the room, and the 65" height ensures even illumination.The Bluetooth app and remote control functionality make customization a breeze. Syncing the lights with music creates an immersive experience, elevating both casual nights and lively gatherings. The 24-hour timing feature is convenient, allowing me to schedule the perfect ambiance for any time of day.With a staggering 398+ DIY modes, the possibilities are endless. I've enjoyed experimenting with various color combinations to suit my mood and décor. The lamp's build quality is impressive, ensuring durability without compromising on style.Overall, the RGB Corner Floor Lamp is a versatile and contemporary lighting solution that goes beyond traditional floor lamps. It adds a touch of sophistication while offering a multitude of lighting options to suit any occasion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome features and easy to use, highly recommend!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this lamp to use in my office and have been really pleased with it so far! The variety of colors and modes, technically possessing over 16 million total options according to the description, is astounding. The easy DIY settings let me create the perfect ambiance my office and change it up depending on what I'm doing - bright if I need to take pictures, or softer if I'm using with a video call, or colorful for gaming. It's easy to control through the app, remote, or it also has a control box whch is super convenient, since some of them are basically useless if you lose the remote, but definitely not this one. The music pulse feature is definitely a cool feature that is fun to play around with. The lamp's sleek design fits nicely in any corner, and it's easy to assemble and disassemble. Overall, I highly recommend this RGB lamp for anyone looking to add a nice, easy to use but full-feature lighting option to their room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful lamp and extremely easy to setup!
reviews.reviewText: This RGB Corner Floor Lamp was super easy to setup! Overall it took about 5ish minutes to build and setup, I would recommend you purchase a plug for the lamp as it plugs in via USB connector but I already had a spare USB plug adapter to use for myself.The lights are quite bright and I very much like the convenience of being able to switch the height of my lamp. The app such an easy setup also! All I had to do was download the app and that was it, the remote connectivity of the app is also very responsive and gives you a lot of customization options for the lights colors.This lamp has made a great addition to my room and looks very stylish, I'm very happy with the pricepoint I purchased this product at, compared to other RGB floorlamps on the market, this made a very affordable option for me. Overall, I am very happy with this product! :D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for mood lighting
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost this was a pretty sturdy assembly. The remote control was also very handy. However I bought this to be a light for behind my couch so I could read, but it was not bright enough. The picture shows that it is pretty bright but it was not in person.If you are looking for a light for more of a moonlighting and something pretty, this would be amazing for that!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice lights, but multiples are hard to program individually
reviews.reviewText: These are nice, but no matter how many time I fix them so each of my kids can control their own, they seem to revert to get mixed up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevated Ambiance and Functionality
reviews.reviewText: I added this Floor Lamp to my den, and it has transformed the atmosphere of the room. The installation process is easy.With a spectrum of RGB color-changing options and countless DIY modes, it's a creative powerhouse.I love the lamp's ability to sync with music and TV sounds. It responds seamlessly, amplifying the sensory experience and turning my den into a dynamic space. The app and remote provide seamless control. The customization options provided by both the app and remote are extensive, offering me the freedom to tailor the lighting to my exact preferences.I'm content with this purchase, and the thought of getting another one to pair with this one has crossed my mind. This is a good choice that delivers both style and functionality at this price point.
